descriptionHtml:
Hi People,
My english isnt the best so ill try to hold the description as short as possible. 

This mod replaces the light imperial Armor from the imperial soldiers with the heavy one. It also replaces the heavy armor (plate) with a retexed version of the tulius armor, so all special soldiers like Hadvar and the Legats will use the Tulius armor mesh and the new texture. This mod also retex the light imperial gauntlet so it fits better to the tulius armor. 

i tried to edit the texture, so that it fits perfect to the heavy imperial armor

I hate writing descriptions :-D 
You will see the rest in the screenshots.

This is my first mod for skyrim ever and it takes me alot of time to edit the texture in photoshop.

Give me a feedback, leave a comment and endorse:)
author: Trafi
